data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Bocas del Toro, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bocas del Toro, Panama
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bocas del Toro, Panama. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 16 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Bocas del Toro, Panama.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, may the churches in Bocas del Toro, Panama honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 125,500 souls living in the state of Bocas del Toro with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Bocas del Toro who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 27,089 believers in the state of Bocas del Toro the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Bocas del Toro to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
